personalInfo.clubAffl: Red Deer G&CC (Red Deer, Alberta, Canada)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 54th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Advanced to the final stage of the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament for the first time and earned conditional status on the Web.com Tour after finishing T139...Played primarily on the Canadian Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was a two-time NAIA first-team All-American in college...Made his PGA TOUR debut, at the 2011 RBC Canadian Open at Shaughnessy G&CC, where he missed the cut.
tourBios.personal: If not in golf, he would be the owner of a fishing lodge...Follows the Minnesota Vikings and Edmonton Oilers...Twitter account is @M_Evanecz...Uses LONGballinc headcovers...Dream foursome would include Moe Norman, Tiger Woods and Bobby Jones.

tourBios.carHigh: 2013: Earned Web.com Tour status by advancing through all three stages of PGA TOUR Qualifying School. 2012: Made five cuts in his PGA TOUR Canada rookie season, with his best finish a T27 at the Time Colonist Island Savings Open. 2011: Qualified for the RBC Canadian Open at Shaughnessy G&CC. 2010: Won the Glencoe Invitational. 2009: Won the Glencoe Invitational.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the 2009 Alberta Amateur champion. Low amateur in the Alberta Open in 2008, 2009 and 2011...Two-time, first-team NAIA All-America at the University of Victoria.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golfers are Tiger Woods, Lee Westwood and PGA TOUR Canada alumni Steve Stricker...Favorite course is Sahalee CC...Favorite sports teams are the Edmonton Oilers, Minnesota Vikings and Toronto Blue Jays...If not in golf, he would be the owner of a fishing lodge. Twitter account is @M_Evanecz...Uses LONGballinc headcovers...Dream foursome would include Moe Norman, Woods and Bobby Jones.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada was T27th in 2012 at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T29th in Par 3 Birdie or Better Leaders on the PGA TOUR Canada.
